column5: Which of these chips have the most accurate maps for the Canadian side of Lake of the Woods? And, is there a difference in various locations on the Canadian side? Any information regarding when those areas were remapped and the the type of GPS accuracy was used to map the lake? Thanks

The lake master is in 1ft but not all the way to kenora. If you are going to be in the kenora area you will have to use navionics. I use both chips when I am on the Canada side. PM if you want more details do not try to call hummingbird cause they will not be able to tell you.
